PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2017-08402017-06-20,  ,  IT,  ,  , 
ActFinancial Administration Act
Export Development Act
SubjectExport Development Canada
PrecisOrder authorizing EXPORT DEVELOPMENT CANADA (EDC) (1) to procure the incorporation, pursuant to the Canada Business Corporations Act, of a wholly-owned subsidiary that is yet to be named, and on its incorporation, to acquire from it all of its shares that would be held by EDC; and (2) authorizing the transations set out in paragraph (a), on condition that the head office of the subsidiary be located in Montreal.
AttachmentsAttachment
